name: O que é ser computeiro
description: This talk shows a bit of what you need to become a CS guy and what ou (can) do after you get there. It was part of the talks for 2011 and 2012 editions of Unicamp de Portas Abertas, that happened respectively on 2011-09-02 and 2012-09-01 at Unicamp, Campinas, São Paulo, Brazil
